#summary This page documents how to use or-tools from binary archives.

= Introduction =

OR-Tools can be used directly from binary archives.
This is an how-to.

= Details =

We provide binary modules for:
  * [OrToolsWithCpp C++]
  * [OrToolsWithPyPi Python]
  * [OrToolsWithJava Java]
  * [OrToolsWithDotNet .NET]
